Fantastic little cafe with both hot & cold tapas.  Cold tapas are self service from the case along the long counter.  It's absolutely empty at 8 pm, but by 9:30 it's packed.  There a lots of other cafes in the area, but they were all dead while this one was hopping and for good reason.  You can have a simple meal as fast or slow as you wish.  Great place to have drinks, beer or homemade sangria, custom mixed fresh each pitcher.  Popular locals gathering spot.Food is fantastic and varied from simple/safe to the more challenging for the adventurous.  The staff is very accommodating and happy to explain all the dishes.  This has to be one of the least expensive meals in BCN, yet has incredible quality.  Definitely a must-do when visiting Barcelona.  Lots of families with kids go early.
